Recommendations: 1. To ensure safe keeping of donated laboratory equipment, a memorandum receipt be issued to end users.
2. The administration may consider to schedule the conduct of training on the repair and maintenance of high end equipment/apparatus.
3. The administration may prioritize the construction of additional stock room for supplies.
4. To maximize the efficiency of the state of the art equipment and apparatus, proper handling and safekeeping is necessary.
5. Modification of laboratory rooms might be taken into consideration to accommodate additional equipment for the laboratory work and instruction.
6. The repair of the existing cabinets may be considered for the safe keeping of the materials and apparatus in the laboratory rooms.
